unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India ar Pakistan cricket match 15/08/2024 ghari 2:30 PM IST te hoiyo aa, thik aa toh? Ale janana plan ku aakta hoyo aape!
normalised: Arrey bhai, India aar Pakistan cricket match baro August rooj two thousand twenty four gee, beela baje PM IST te hena, theek ge to? Aleeyang aamaam kaajem kuri daari aah, aalokaam hiriingaa!
text: Arrey bhai, India ar Pakistan cricket match 15/08/2024 ghari 2:30 PM IST te hoiyo aa, thik aa toh? Ale janana plan ku aakta hoyo aape!
